item.title: Apps
item.description: Friday Fellows Updater Friday Fellows Updater is an open source web application to track and manage the Anime watch history of my friends from Anime Club. Twine Games I love the concept of online interactive fiction and created some simple games using Twine: Cellar Crawl - Play Explore the dark cellar beneith a creepy house to discover its secret. Journey - Play Travel the high seas, overcoming challenges in an Oregon Trail inspired game.
